shrimp.name: Printf
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: var
input.type: float color normal vector point matrix string

output.name: val
output.type: float color normal vector point matrix string

shrimp.usage: Similar to the C printf, prints the contents of the specified variables into stdout. The formatting for the string uses %f, %c, %p, %m and %s, for variables of type float, color, normal/vector/point, matrix, and string.
